column2:
"Recently, I heard that D-arkers are
gathering and creating violence at the
Mining Base. "

"I also heard that there's a large number
of them around but it does not matter.
I'll destroy whatever I see, that's it."

"So let's move out and destroy them all
swiftly. They have absolutely no place
in this world."

"最近、ダーカーが群れて採掘基地で
暴れてるんだってね。"

"結構な数で襲ってくるって聞いてるけど
そんなのはどうだっていい。
居るなら消す、それだけだ。"

"ってわけで、さっさと駆逐してきてよ。
ヤツらに存在価値なんてない。"
